meanings.sent1: After losing weight, she reenlarges her clothes to fit better.
meanings.sent2: The baker reenlarges the cake to add more layers.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally reenlarges the balloon too much, and it pops!
meanings.sent4: The artist reenlarges the canvas of his painting to capture more detail.
meanings.sent5: The gardener reenlarges the flowerbed to plant more flowers.

meanings.definition: To increase in size once more.
meanings.sent1: The company reenlarges its production capacity to meet the growing demand.
meanings.sent2: With proper care, the plant reenlarges its leaves after wilting.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal reenlarges itself after being squeezed tightly.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approaches, the waves reenlarges, crashing against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline reenlarges as new skyscrapers are built.
